text.english: Teorema: \(\texttt{mul}\) of the succesor of a natural number, i.e. \[ \forall n,m \in \mathcal{N}Term . \; \texttt{mul}(n,S(m)) = \texttt{add}(\texttt{mul}(n,m),n) \]
text.italiano: Teorema: \(\texttt{mul}\) di un successore di un qualsiasi numero naturale, i.e. \[ \forall n,m \in \mathcal{N}Term . \; \texttt{mul}(n,S(m)) = \texttt{add}(\texttt{mul}(n,m),n) \]

theorem.coq: Theorem mul_succ: forall n m : nterm , mul n (S m) = add (mul n m) n.
